long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Click-to-Call Chrome Extension simplifies phone communication by allowing users to initiate calls directly from their Chrome browser. Users can click on any phone number displayed on a web page to instantly initiate a call. No need to manually type in phone numbers; simply click and connect.

When integrated with JoinedUp CRM, it enables call pop-ups within the CRM, creates leads, contacts, accounts, tasks, and logs call details. Users can view and manage call logs directly within JoinedUp CRM.

The extension seamlessly integrates with the Elisha Telecom Unified Communications Platform.
